name: Rival Wars
description:
Rival Wars is a mini battle-arena game about robots and trajectory weapons!

  • Play as a robot and defeat the enemy bots!

  • Use different items to your advantage!

  • Use your knowledge regarding trajectories (Ballistic, Horizontal, Freefall) to win the game!

This game is developed for our thesis as BS Mathematics major in Computer Science students. We applied concepts of mathematics such as trajectories during the game development to achieve different functions and mechanics.
